newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ wool prices mixed at Napier sale.
newsitem.headline: NZ wool prices mixed at Napier sale.

text.p: New Zealand wool prices generally firmed but fleece prices eased at Thursday's Napier sale, the Market Indicator slipping 6 cents to 418 cents, Wools of New Zealand said.
The strong segment indicator fell 6 cents to 354 cents, while the lamb indicator rose five cents to 402.

Of the 1,710 clean tonnes on offer, 11 percent was crossbred fleece, 64 percent was second shear, 8 percent lambswool, 11 percent second shear, bellies and pieces, with the balance miscellaneous wools.
Some 18 percent of the offer was passed in.
